name: Save a new submitted forms in ConvertBox to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new form is submitted in ConvertBox, Make will automatically add data from that form to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/147AHA6NWP3QSXkK2aTujTDsZ8kLGm8lmLlpPM8IjFIo/edit?usp=sharing).
